attributes.action: Legislate so that menstrual products should be given to women at no cost.
attributes.additional_details:
(Specifically not calling them feminine hygiene products)
If men menstruated it would be a national and international emergency. It is high time, that we as a civilised society, stop the need for women to have to pay for something that they have no control over.
Therefore, on request from a pharmacist, without a prescription, menstrual products should be given to women (and men) at no cost.
attributes.background: It is within the power of parliament and the legislature to ensure that women do not suffer the economic costs of something they have no control over.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
